rowboat.name: Rowboating
rowboat.description: Enjoy peaceful moments in nature during a leisurely row around beautiful Lake Mohonk. Our classic wooden row boats are uniquely designed for Mohonk Mountain House.

forestBathing.name: Forest Bathing
forestBathing.description: Explore a dynamic range of mindfulness and wellness programs throughout your stay that can reduce stress and enhance well-being. Join us for meditation, forest bathing, yoga, and fitness programs, all in a beautiful natural setting.

carriage.name: Carriage Rides
carriage.description: There's no better way to tour Mohonk's grounds than in an old-fashioned mule-drawn carriage. During Mohonk's early years, horses were the sole means of transportation for guests, baggage, and freight. Visitors arrived in their own horse-drawn buggies or were picked up at train stations by Mohonk carriages.

horses.name: Horseback Riding
horses.description: Embark on a trail ride over our scenic carriage roads at Mohonk Mountain House. Led by experienced trail guides, we'll take you through some of the most beautiful parts of our property on horseback.

bike.name: Biking
bike.description: Experience the rugged, scenic beauty of the Hudson Valley on a mountain bike. Explore over 40 miles of wooded trails and dramatic overlooks.

golf.name: Golfing
golf.description: Surrounded by lush greenery and rolling hills, our golf course offers incredible views of the Hudson Valley region for golfers of all levels. Named one of the Top 10 Environmentally Friendly Courses in the United States by Linksmagazine and a Dream Eighteen destination by The Poughkeepsie Journal for its challenging first hole, the golf course at Mohonk Mountain House is a must-play!

fire.name: CampFire
fire.description: Take a seat by the campfire and make everlasting memories during your stay at Mohonk!

climbing.name: Rock climbing
climbing.description: Mohonk offers some of the best rock climbing in the Northeast! Take in breathtaking views of the Hudson Valley as you scale the heights of the Shawangunk Ridge. Climbers must be escorted by an authorized guide from Alpine Endeavors.

archery.name: Archery and Tomahawk Throwing
archery.description: Learn and master the art of balance, aim, and power with archery & tomahawk throwing. Quiet your mind and focus your aim in a tranquil, natural setting.

tennisRed.name: Tennis
tennisRed.description: The resort features four beautifully groomed Har-Tru courts and two red clay soft courts, and was named one of the Top World Tennis Resorts by Tennis Resorts Online! Overnight guests can enjoy complimentary court time or book a private lesson with our Head Tennis Pro.

garden.name: The Garden
garden.description: Explore the spectacular gardens at Mohonk on your own, or join one of our master gardeners for a tour through our Victorian Show Garden. Each year, the Garden showcases a different theme and incorporates more than 300 species of flowers and plants.

hiking.name: Hiking
hiking.description: Mohonk Mountain House offers over 85 miles of hiking trails, ranging from beginner to advanced levels of difficulty. From carriage roads to rock scrambles, we have some of the best and most diverse hiking trails in New York!

climber.name: Rock Climbing
climber.description: Mohonk offers some of the best rock climbing in the Northeast! Take in breathtaking views of the Hudson Valley as you scale the heights of the Shawangunk Ridge. Climbers must be escorted by an authorized guide from Alpine Endeavors.

labryinth.name: The Labyrinth
labryinth.description: Mohonk is famous for the Labyrinth rock scramble created by naturally-formed boulders. On your journey in the Labyrinth, climb through the Lemon Squeeze to reach iconic views of the Hudson Valley.
